title.a: Knockdown - #VermontFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/12/2022 INC#0342

item.description: Knockdown - #VermontFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0342; 07:30AM; 761 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnoZrb; #Koreatown; 89 LAFD Firefighters took just 36 minutes of well-coordinated offensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames from an exterior fire that extended within one (yet to be identified) business in a 200' x 50' one-story strip mall. Firefighters skillfully prevented the flames from extending laterally, preventing fire damage to the other10+ businesses in the structure. The specific cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E15 E203 E210 E211 E226 E229 E29 E3 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA29 RA3 RA803 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #VermontFire 02/12/2022 INC#0342

item.description: Update #VermontFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0342; 07:25AM; 761 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnoZrb; #Koreatown; With 89 LAFD personnel assigned, this stubborn fire involving at least one unit in a 200' x 50' one-story row of commercial businesses, has escalated to Greater Alarm status and is known as the #VermontFire.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E15 E203 E210 E211 E226 E229 E29 E3 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA29 RA3 RA803 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0342; 06:54AM; 761 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JnoZrb; #Koreatown; PRELIM: An exterior rubbish fire has extended into the wall and interior of one centrally located unit in a 200' x 50' one-story 200' row of commercial businesses.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 E11 E13 E211 E229 E29 E6 RA29 RA813 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic - Auto vs Ped; INC#0926; 01:12PM; 6400 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rLArHg; Van Nuys; Two car collision caused one vehicle to then strike a pedestrian. A total of three patients involved (all are adults): The pedestrian is a male, transported in critical condition. One female patient transported in serious condition and one male transported with non-life threatening injuries. Any further questions are directed to LAPD Inc# 2324. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E39 RA39 RA903 RA93 RA98; CH8; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0191; 04:25AM; 4115 W Olympic Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/35Uy2Bl; Koreatown; FIRE NOW OUT: 30 firefighters extinguished fire in one unit of a row of commercials in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the unit of origin, preventing it from extending through the exposed businesses. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC11 BC18 E13 E226 E229 E26 E29 RA29 RA826 T26 T29 ; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0968; 02:30PM; 15954 W Valerio St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bb48od; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fires in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the two adjacent (detached) garages. Wind carried embers onto neighboring properties and firefighters quickly handled it to ensure no further extension. None of the primary residences were damaged. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E287 E289 E290 E88 RA81 RA90 T87 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Automobile Fire; INC#0968; 02:04PM; 15954 W Valerio St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bb48od; Van Nuys; An RV fire has extended into two adjacent garages. There are also wires down, pole to pole (DWP being notified). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; E287 T87; CH8; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0770; 12:34PM; 6257 N Saloma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uKQWVI; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was well established in the converted attic space and high winds put the home on the north (Delta) side at risk. Firefighters established a handline to defend the exposed home and prevented the fire from extending / damaging it. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E73 E83 E90 RA102 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0770; 12:13PM; 6257 N Saloma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uKQWVI; Van Nuys; One story, single family dwelling with an attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E73 E83 E90 RA102 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1321; 05:26PM; 7635 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B8K05S; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. The fire extended into one adjacent unit prior to knockdown. One adult female was transported for burn injuries in *at least* serious condition. No other injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E260 E289 E77 E89 RA102 RA60 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
